organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The needs and requirements specific to the design, procurement, construction, maintenance, and operation of a microwave system are addressed. Steps for a variety of applications have been included in this guide; however, users should select only those steps that apply to their particular system(s) and their procurement policies.
